text: Pangali gambidwa kwa jwangalola, soni pangali gambidwa kwa jwannemale, nambo soni pangali gambidwa kwa jwakulwala (naga ngaakwaula kungondo). Soni jwatampikanile Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ, takan’jinjisye ku Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima sulo chapasi pakwe. Sano jwatagalauche, nikuti tannagasye ni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
